Package model.board

Class Board

java.lang.Object
observer.Observable
model.board.Board
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Observer
public class Board extends Observable implements Serializable, Observer
This class represents the board of the game.

  • Method Details

    • getSpace

      public BoardSpace getSpace(int x, int y)
      Returns the specified space in the board
      Parameters:
      x - is the X coordinate of the tile in the board.
      y - is the Y coordinate of the tile in the board.
      Returns:
      the tile at the requested (X,Y) coordinates.

    • pickupObjectFrom

      public ObjectCard pickupObjectFrom(BoardSpace boardSpace)
      This method allows players to pick up an object from a tile of the board.
      Parameters:
      boardSpace - is the tile where the player wants to pick up an object card from.
      Returns:
      the object contained in the tile.

    • putObjectIn

      public void putObjectIn(BoardSpace boardSpace, ObjectCard objectCard)
      This method allows you to put an object in the specified tile.
      Parameters:
      boardSpace - is the tile the server wants to put the object card in.
      objectCard - is the object card that will be in the tile.

    • isSpaceSurrounded

      public boolean isSpaceSurrounded(int row, int column)
      This method is a checker used in the pick object method in the controller.
      Parameters:
      row - is the row of the object.
      column - is the column of the object.
      Returns:
      true if the space is surrounded by other objects, false otherwise.

    • isSpaceSurroundedByNull

      public boolean isSpaceSurroundedByNull(int row, int column)
      This method is a checker used in the controller to check whether the board needs to be restored.
      Parameters:
      row - is the row of the object.
      column - is the column of the object.
      Returns:
      true if the space is surrounded only by empty spaces, false otherwise.

    • update

      public void update(Message message)
      Description copied from interface: Observer
      This method is used to update the observers with a Message.
      Specified by:
      update in interface Observer
      Parameters:
      message - is the message used to share information.
